message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price of $140. I think you'll really like it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $140 is a bit higher than I'd like to pay. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I can do $135, but I was thinking more along the lines of $137. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. Let me know if that works for you.
